content.query:
-- District level query for Post secondary file
-- * case statement needs to be updated each time there is a new data ingestion. 

/*
IF EXISTS (
    SELECT 1
    FROM sys.tables
    WHERE name = 'PostSecondaryDistrict' AND schema_id = SCHEMA_ID('transform')
)
BEGIN
    EXEC('DROP TABLE transform.PostSecondaryDistrict')
END
*/



select concat(cast(cast([CohortYearTTL] as int)-1 as Nvarchar), '-', right([CohortYearTTL],2)) AS [Cohort Year]
	  ,'District' as [OrganizationLevel]
	  ,[School Code]
	  ,coalesce([School Name],[SchoolName]) as [SchoolName]
	  ,[Local District Code] as [DistrictCode]
	  ,coalesce([Local District], [DistrictName]) as [DistrictName]
      ,[StudentGroupType] 
      ,[StudentGroupCategory]
      ,[StudentGroup]
      ,[PSEnrollLevel] as [PS Enroll Level]
      ,[Pct]
      ,[RedactedPct] as [Redacted Pct]
      ,[cohortType] as [Cohort Type]

--Into transform.PostSecondaryDistrict
From [cleanse].[PostSecondary] a
left join [staging].[CharterSchoolDirectory] b on a.[Districtname] = b.[Local District]
Inner join [dim].[StudentGroup] c on a .[DemographicValue] = c.[StudentGroupKey]
where [DistrictName] is not null
